revised_title: Structural Aspects of High Modulus Aromatic Polyamide Fibers
tldr: This article investigates the molecular and supramolecular structures of an aromatic polyamide fiber, Kevlar 49, and explores the relationship between these structures and the fiber's exceptional mechanical properties. The authors use X-ray diffraction and electron microscopy to study the fiber's structure and discuss the factors contributing to its high tensile modulus and strength.
